title: Image Super Resolution
description: This PoC demonstrates two key enhancements using Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs): improving image resolution from low to high and effectively removing motion blur.
author: Dheeraj
technicalHighlights: User uploads image and receives enhanced output
content: This PoC enables insurance adjusters to convert low-quality or blurred images into high-definition visuals, allowing for faster and more accurate claims assessments. This is enabled by using a Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) to enhance the image resolution and deblurring.
